Name: record_date
Comment: The date that data was published.

Name: creditor_agency_nm
Comment: The name of the federal or state agency that refers delinquent debts to the Treasury Offset Program.   An agency that requests the Fiscal Service's services in collecting its delinquent debt by inclusion in TOP for administrative offset.

Name: creditor_agency_id
Comment: The ID of the federal or state agency that refers delinquent debts to the Treasury Offset Program.   An agency that requests the Fiscal Service's services in collecting its delinquent debt by inclusion in TOP for administrative offset.

Name: agency_type
Comment: Type of creditor agency, based on whether the agency is a Federal or state entity and based on the type of debt they refer to the Treasury Offset Program.

Name: agency_site
Comment: Identifying alpha/numeric field for the Federal or state agency participating in the Treasury Offset Program.   Assigned by the U.S. Treasury.

Name: agency_site_nm
Comment: Identifying alpha/numeric field for the Federal or state agency participating in the Treasury Offset Program.   Assigned by the U.S. Treasury.

Name: source_agency
Comment: Identifier of the Creditor Agency who received the offset collections.

Name: source_agency_1
Comment: Identifier of the Creditor Agency who received the offset collections.

Name: source_agency_site
Comment: Identifier of the Creditor Agency who received the offset collections.

Name: payment_agency_nm
Comment: The name of the federal agency that certifies payment information in either a check or ACH format and requests payment disbursement by the Fiscal Service.  In TOP processing, a payment agency is a Federal or state agency which provides payment files that

Name: payment_agency
Comment: The ID of the federal agency that certifies payment information in either a check or ACH format and requests payment disbursement by the Fiscal Service.  In TOP processing, a payment agency is a Federal or state agency which provides payment files that a

Name: agency_type_cd
Comment: Type of payment agency, based on whether the agency is a Federal or state entity and based on the type of debt referred to the Treasury Offset Program.

Name: payment_source_desc
Comment: Federal or state agency that provides the payment file to the match against the TOP System for delinquent debt collection.

Name: payment_source_cd
Comment: Code for the federal or state agency that provides the payment file to the match against the TOP System for delinquent debt collection.

Name: payment_category
Comment: Type of Federal or state payment matched against TOP system.

Name: payment_type_desc
Comment: Payment Type: (OCSE use only) This will be a unique TOP code identifying the type of payment being offset or levied, if applicable.

Name: payment_type_cd
Comment: Payment Type: (OCSE use only) This will be a unique TOP code identifying the type of payment being offset or levied, if applicable.

Name: payment_type_id
Comment: Payment Type: (OCSE use only) This will be a unique TOP code identifying the type of payment being offset or levied, if applicable.

Name: debt_type_cd
Comment: The code describing the nature of the debt owed to the Federal or state agency, as defined by Debt Management Systems (DMS), based on how the debt was originated and what type of agency it is owed.  Must be a valid Debt Type as identified by DMS.

Name: debt_type_desc
Comment: The nature of the debt owed to the Federal or state agency, as defined by Debt Management Services (DMS), based on how the debt was originated and what type of agency it is owed.  Must be a valid Debt Type as identified by DMS.  Currently TOP has 6 debt

Name: taxable
Comment: IRS Federal tax debt, or state income tax debt or unemployment insurance compensation debt referred to TOP.

Name: gross_amt
Comment: The dollar value of offsets before any reversals.

Name: net_amt
Comment: The dollar value of offsets once reversals have been removed.

Name: gross_cnt
Comment: The amount of offsets before any reversals.

Name: net_cnt
Comment: The count of offsets once reversals have been removed.

Name: record_fiscal_year
Comment: The fiscal year associated with record_date.  The federal government's fiscal year runs from October 1 to September 30.

Name: record_fiscal_quarter
Comment: The fiscal quarter associated with record_date.  For the federal government these quarters are: Q1 - October to December, Q2 - January to March, Q3 - April to June, Q4 - July to September.

Name: record_calendar_year
Comment: The calendar year associated with record_date.

Name: record_calendar_quarter
Comment: The calendar quarter associated with record_date.

Name: record_calendar_month
Comment: The calendar month associated with record_date.

Name: record_calendar_day
Comment: The calendar day associated with record_date.

Name: record_date
Comment: The date that data was published.

Name: state_nm
Comment: Name of the state/territory or District of Columbia participating in the Treasury Offset Program.

Name: state_cd
Comment: Code of the state/territory or District of Columbia participating in the Treasury Offset Program.

Name: program_desc
Comment: Narrative description of the offset matching program, based on debt type authorized and eligible for delinquent debt collection.

Name: program_id
Comment: ID of the offset matching program, based on debt type authorized and eligible for delinquent debt collection.

Name: is_program_participation
Comment: Indicator of whether the Federal agency or state participates in the Treasury Offset Program.

Name: is_complete_year
Comment: Whether the current collection year has been completed.

Name: total_amt
Comment: The dollar value of offsets.

Name: record_fiscal_year
Comment: The fiscal year associated with record_date.  The federal government's fiscal year runs from October 1 to September 30.

Name: record_fiscal_quarter
Comment: The fiscal quarter associated with record_date.  For the federal government these quarters are: Q1 - October to December, Q2 - January to March, Q3 - April to June, Q4 - July to September.

Name: record_calendar_year
Comment: The calendar year associated with record_date.

Name: record_calendar_quarter
Comment: The calendar quarter associated with record_date.

Name: record_calendar_month
Comment: The calendar month associated with record_date.

Name: record_calendar_day
Comment: The calendar day associated with record_date.
